## Import libraries

```{r}
library(tidymodels)
library(readr)
library(forcats)
library(DataExplorer)
library(stringr)

```

## Import data

```{r}
train <- read_csv('data/train.csv' ) |> 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r}
train |> glimpse()

```

```{r}
train |> 
  count(survived)
```

Plot numerical variables

```{r}
plot_histogram(train |> select(-passenger_id))

```

Plot categorical variables

```{r}
plot_bar(train)

```

Plot missing

```{r}
plot_missing(train)
```
